name: Project Explore
description: A 2D sandbox survival game designed for creators, players, and everyone else.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or AMD Athlon 64 X2 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 128MB graphics with DirectX 11, Shader Level 3.0 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: This runs on just about any potato.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Intel i3 550 or AMD Phenom II X2 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256MB graphics with DirectX 11, Shader Level 3.0 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 250 MB available space Additional Notes: This runs on just about any potato.
